name: Snare
overview: A game with at least a fellowship with Boulderdash, in that is takes plays in a multidirectional maze and is a collect-and avoid type game. This game by Enigma Software Developments was released in 1992 and is a precursor to Muzzy. This is the first release of this game, using the original title from the Spectrum version and featuring music by Andy Brown, who quit the team prior to the development of the enhanced follow-up, entitled MUZZY.
